column3: ej,farrs001,P,clara901,Throwing at Albert Belle $the second pitch by Steve Farr to Albert Belle was near his knee; Belle had been HBP earlier in the inning after Carlos Baerga's first homer of the frame; Farr ejected by HP umpire Al ClarkFILENAME_TX"

ej,martc002,P,hendt901,Fighting with Kelly Downs ej,downk001,P,hendt901,Fighting with Carlos Martinez $pitcher Kelly Downs started yelling at batter Carlos Martinez; after the fourth pitch was fouled off, the shouting intensified and HP umpire Ted Hendry tried to get between the players; Martinez tried to go around Hendry, who ejected both players; catcher Scott Hemond tackled Martinez and both benches cleared1993CLE.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
ej,martc002,P,clara901,Balls and strikes Carlos Martinez ejected by HP umpire Al Clark1993CLE.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
